# User Interface Options

Keys or values for the size of the input parameter controls for a filter view.

## Constants

- **IKUISizeFlavor**: A key for the size of the controls in a filter view. The associated value  can be  [`IKUISizeMini`](doc://com.apple.quartz/documentation/Quartz/IKUISizeMini), [`IKUISizeSmall`](doc://com.apple.quartz/documentation/Quartz/IKUISizeSmall), or  [`IKUISizeRegular`](doc://com.apple.quartz/documentation/Quartz/IKUISizeRegular).
- **IKUISizeMini**: A very small control.
- **IKUISizeSmall**: A small control.
- **IKUISizeRegular**: A standard size control.
- **IKUImaxSize**: The maximum size of a filter view.
- **IKUIFlavorAllowFallback**: Substitute controls of another size. The associated value is a Boolean value. If the filter cannot provide a view for the requested size and a fallback is allowed, the filter can use controls of a different size.

## Constants

- **Filter Attribute Keys**: Attributes for a filter and its parameters.
- **Data Type Attributes**: Numeric data types.
- **Vector Quantity Attributes**: Vector data types.
- **Color Attribute Keys**: Color types.
- **Image Attribute Keys**: Image Types
- **Filter Category Keys**: Categories of filters.
- **Options for Applying a Filter**: Options that control the application of a custom Core Image filter.
- **User Interface Control Options**: Sets of controls for various user scenarios.
- **Filter Parameter Keys**: Keys for input parameters to filters.
- **RAW Image Options**: Options for creating a [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIFilter-swift.class] object from RAW image data.
